Articles.Content:
If there's anything I can still do to help, just tell me and I will come.

This is taken directly from the first page of the OP:

"anyone can help with this mod. there will not be any 'managers' or 'teams' officially, but a community to make this as good as it can be!"

This is taken directly from the first page of the OP:

"anyone can help with this mod. there will not be any 'managers' or 'teams' officially, but a community to make this as good as it can be!"

Eh, it was worth a try.

Eh, it was worth a try.

There is only a need for people who have experience with modeling, texturing, Unity, part/game balance, FAR integration and those kinds of things. If you know how to do any of those things, I'm sure there are plenty of things you can help out with.

There is only a need for people who have experience with modeling, texturing, Unity, part/game balance, FAR integration and those kinds of things. If you know how to do any of those things, I'm sure there are plenty of things you can help out with.

Well, im workin on those, but they aren't there yet.
Great to see this back Mike! All the luck for you and Triston!
Wait what happened to the old thread?

Wait what happened to the old thread?

Some drama, and mike did the right thing and decided to start over.

- - - Updated - - -

Mike, would it be possible to add an option to have the external tank white?

it is a texture switch option already. I will check it still works

- - - Updated - - -

yes 2 shades of white

Oh, I never realized!

Silly me.

Welp, lets get started. Got a IVA bug.

1.0.4

1.7.9.1

RO/FAR Yep

Issue: IVA view has a scaled up that blocks the windows.

Description: Here's a Photo.

http://i.imgur.com/hZMmG1O.png

lol wow never noticed but totally understand.

let me think...what I can do here is scale up the real iva to match, but kerbals will remain same size so it would look like they are sitting in a big cockpit,

or scale down the external view cockpit so you wont see it from iva, but would look weird on external view with its small cockpit, or

remove external view cockpit,

or put in surrounding textures in the IVA cockpit that will make everything behind it be transparent.

let me think on this...

Can I have anyone let me know what the mechjeb settings is for stock or RO, also a recomended launch guide/what works for you

Many thanks
